game.name: Tombbound
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the afterlife’s most dangerous internship. In this co-op extraction horror, you serve Anubis. Raid cursed tombs, dodge mythological horrors, and collect enough cursed relics to meet the God of Death's quota. Remember: The scales of justice do not tolerate lighter wallets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the afterlife’s most dangerous internship. In this co-op extraction horror, you serve Anubis. Raid cursed tombs, dodge mythological horrors, and collect enough cursed relics to meet the God of Death's quota. Remember: The scales of justice do not tolerate lighter wallets.
